latestNews.title: Nose picking ban for Manila police
latestNews.description: A new directive tells police in Manila not to pick their noses whilst on duty

latestNews.title: Australian police find gun in biker's bottom
latestNews.description: Police in Australia find a loaded hangun wedged in the behind of a gang linked motorcyclist

latestNews.title: Town's giant dog dropping goes missing
latestNews.description: Local police on the trail of a missing inflatable dog mess

latestNews.title: Austrian man wins right to be called Zebra
latestNews.description: An Austrian man has won a court case enabling him to change his family name back to 'Zebra'
